movie.title: Only The Brave
movie.plot: A searing portrait of war and prejudice, 'Only the Brave' takes you on a haunting journey into the hearts and minds of the forgotten heroes of WWII - the Japanese-American 100th/442nd.

events.title: the battle for the Lost Batallion begins
the battle for the Lost Batallion is one, and the soldiers of the 1st Battalion, 141st Infantry are rescued
